articles.title: Covid-19 NZ Live: Wellington's first day back at alert level 2 - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Wellingtonians are adapting to a return to the higher alert level, after an Australian Covid-19 case visited the capital.
articles.content:
Wellingtonians are adapting to a return to the higher alert level, after an Australian Covid-19 case visited the capital.
Low scanning rates will impact authorities ability to trace potential cases.
